author: GamingBolt
description:
Metal Gear Solid 3 was an already brilliant story thanks to the way Hideo Kojima used the art of cinema to present his characters and narrative beats in ways that made it classy.

Konami's recent remake has done well to preserve all of the legendary storyteller's tricks from back in the day while also managing to modernize it, making it hit all the more harder and faster as a result. 

The remake is thus the definitive way to enjoy the game, and does well to use modern hardware to improve on crucial aspects of the experience that make it shine as a beacon for future remakes. 

Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater is pure cinema, and we're here to tell you how and why. Join us and relive a few memorable moments from the game, and see how the remake made them even better.
title: Metal Gear Solid 3 Remake: Delta Snake Eater Is ABSOLUTE CINEMA

author: GamingBolt
description:
2025 has quietly become one of Xbox’s better years, with big-budget showcases, polished sequels, and surprise indie hits all landing on hardware that makes them shine. Game Pass continues to sweeten the deal, but even outside the subscription ecosystem, the variety and overall quality of this year’s lineup are undeniable. 

From inventive RPGs to precision action games and massive shooters, these games stood out above an already stacked field. They represent the best of what Xbox gaming has to offer right now.
title: 15 Best Xbox Series X | S Games of 2025
